    • Method Detail

      • createEditor

        public FileEditor createEditor(Project project,
                               VirtualFile file)
        Description copied from interface: FileEditorProvider
        Creates editor for the specified file.

        This method is called only if the provider has accepted this file (i.e. method FileEditorProvider.accept(Project, VirtualFile) returned true). The provider should return only valid editor.

        Specified by:
        createEditor in interface FileEditorProvider
        Overrides:
        createEditor in class TextEditorProvider
        Returns:
        created editor for specified file.
